description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger Your turn begins.

Requirements You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious] and have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dying] condition.

The crossroads between life and death is a place that can reveal many secrets. You gain the effects of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Augury] spell in a strange, near-death vision. Empowered by the realization, you then lose the dying condition (becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded]{Wounded 1} or increasing your wounded value by 1, as normal), regain @Damage[2*@actor.level[healing]] Hit Points, and can Stand.
